transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello Hari Om Trading Company se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ha boliye sir.
Executive: Ji hi sir, mai Ranjit Kumar Singh baat kar raha hu, aapka account manager IndiaMART head office Noida se. Do minute sir, do minute, do minute chalu rakhna.
Executive: Okay okay. Hello.
Customer: Abe ek garam pani de na chai banega.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir boliye.
Executive: Hello actually sir mujhe aapse discussion karna tha aapke services ko leke, aapki Maxi service aapne purchase kiya hai, correct?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aapki ha aapki service sir 8 November ko live ho gayi hai IndiaMART ke portal me sir. To usi ke service ke uses ko leke kaise isko use karna hai, kaise iski benefit hai, kya kya service me aapko diya gaya hai sir, to uske regarding discuss karna tha. To kya aap matlab ki free hai discuss kar sakta hu abhi? Nahi maine physical bande ki requirement ki hai sir mail me aapko.
Executive: Physical requirement ke liye sir?
Customer: Ha, physical ka requirement maine mail kiya hua hai sir. Wo Saturday kiya hua hai.
Executive: Ha but. Thik hai wo to sir aapka mail aaya hua hai hamare paas physical requirement ke liye. But sir services jo aap package lete hai IndiaMART se to wo services head office se regulate hoti hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir ek banda to proper aayega na sikhane ke liye.
Executive: Wo hamara kaam hota hai sir aapko video meeting me leke proper tarike se guide karna sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hamare paas ek right hota hai video meeting karna face to face proper tarike se. Jo cheez koi physical banda aapko waha baith ke samjhaye ya koi banda aapko face to face connect hokar mai bhi baith ke aapko proper tarike se samjhaunga ki Maxi service me. Office pahuchna padega abhi to mai dur hu office se.
Executive: Aapka number ye aap number pe call lagao ke dusre number pe lagao?
Executive: Sir ye mera company number hai aap isko Ranjit IndiaMART karke aap save kar lo. Aap mera personal number ek baar note down kar lijiye sir mai personal number bhi aapko bata deta hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Ha 92.
Executive: 92.
Customer: 20.
Executive: 20.
Executive: 21.
Customer: 21.
Executive: 9015.
Customer: 9015.
Executive: Thik hai. Ranjit Kumar Singh ke naam se aap ye save kar lijiye number ye mera personal number hai aur jab jo abhi call kiya wo mera company ka number hai. Thik hai and aap office pahuch ke mujhe message kar dena.
Customer: Okay mai aapko message karta hu.
Executive: Thik hai aap office pahuch ke mujhe message kijiye sir mai proper tarike se aapko connect karta hu aur aap proper guidance deta hu sir. Thik hai?
Customer: Ha ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a physical person for guidance.

Resolution:

- Executive explained video meeting process for guidance.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will message after reaching office.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- physical requirement, video meeting, guidance, maxi service
